controls:
Controls:
P - Plant Potato
C - Plant Carrot
B - Plant Cabbage
H - Harvest Plant
Arrow Keys - Move Player
S - Save Game
L - Load Game
U - Undo
R - Redo
plantAlreadyExists: This tile already has a plant!
plantConditionNotMet: This tile does not meet the planting conditions!
plantNeighborConditionNotMet: Cannot plant {type} here! Requires at least {count} neighboring {type}.
gameLoaded: Game loaded from JSON with undo/redo stacks restored.
